item.title: Specim Unveils High-Speed Hyperspectral Camera for Industry
item.description: Specim launches FX19, a high-speed hyperspectral camera for industrial inspection in the NIR-SWIR range.

item.title: Nikon Enhances Industrial Microscope Portfolio
item.description: Nikon strengthens its industrial microscopy range with new LED-based ECLIPSE models for quality control.

item.title: Mahr Group Completes Acquisition of NanoFocus AG
item.description: Mahr Group acquires remaining shares of NanoFocus AG, fully integrating the surface metrology specialist.

item.title: Flir Launches Long-Life Cooled MWIR Thermal Cameras
item.description: Flir introduces A6450 cooled MWIR cameras designed for continuous industrial automation and non-destructive testing.

item.title: Renishaw Reports Strong Growth in Precision Metrology
item.description: Renishaw reports strong financial results driven by demand in semiconductors, defense, and advanced metrology applications.

item.title: Echodyne Expands Radar Manufacturing for Security and Drones
item.description: Echodyne invests $40M to expand production of radar systems, addressing rising demand in security and drone sectors.

item.title: How Silicon Photonics and FMCW Transform LiDAR Technology
item.description: Advances in silicon photonics and FMCW are making LiDAR smaller and more affordable for widespread industrial adoption.
